name: Son Of Dauntless
description:
It's been a thousand years since Dauntless the dragon protected the kingdom from the forces of darkness; after his death, the lands fell into ruin at the hands of an unspeakable evil. But Dauntless' legacy lives on, and the heir to his title has risen to take on the forces of evil that plague the land.

GAMEPLAY
Control the dragon by sliding your finger around the screen (the dragon fires automatically). Hold an additional finger to the screen to charge up a more powerful shot to slice through pillars and enemies. Collect the gems to gain various upgrades, including health, increased fire rate, drones, and shields. Watch out for moving pillars and leaping fireballs, and beware the imps - each has different speeds and characteristics, and some even fire deadly lightning blasts!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.

FEATURES
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* Intuitive touch-screen controls!
* A plethora of power-ups to aid you on your quest!
* Multiple enemies and hazards to avoid!
* Beautifully-realized 3D environment!
* Incredibly detailed particle effects!
* Atmospheric soundtrack!
* Suitable for players of all ages!
